original_text: Yes, I will continue to work among you in the way that I am already doing. I will not take any pay from you. Then there will be no chance for those other teachers to be proud about themselves. They will not be able to say that they work in the same way that we do.
korean_text: 나는 내가 해 온 그대로 앞으로도 하리니 기회를 찾는 자들이 그 자랑하는 일로 우리와 같이 인정 받으려는 그 기회를 끊으려 함이라

sentences.original_text: Yes, I will continue to work among you
sentences.korean_translation: 네, 나는 너희 가운데서 계속 일할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: in the way that I am already doing
I will not take any pay from you
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희에게서 어떤 보수도 받지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Then there will be no chance
for those other teachers to be proud about themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그 다른 교사들이 자신들에 대해 자랑할

sentences.original_text: They will not be able to say
that they work in the same way that we do
